Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
              Episode 4            – There Is No Tomorrow For A Rascal
paragraph:
Soon after Mai's "puberty syndrome" is resolved, Sakuta encounters another strange phenomenon without respite. Day after              
           day, it is the same day for Sakuta and there is no tomorrow. When he consults Rio, she raises the possibility of "Laplace’s demon" -- that someone may be repeating and redoing a day.
